project1.title: Book Keeper
project1.description: I created this site with the idea of storing a list of all my books digitally. Whether they are digital, physical, or audio. When the site it opened you are taken to your library where you can Create a book, Update that book, and Delete the book. The reason for creating this app was because I wanted a way to check my library away from home so not to double purchase any books. Which is something that has happened to me quite often.
project1.technologiesUsed: React, SASS, JSX, Firebase, React-Bootstrap, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Hat-Exercise
project2.description: This project is an exploration into Bootstrap 4. I used a Bootstrap jumbotron to display a form that can create bootstrap cards with different house names from Harry Potter. The color of each card is based on which house you get and you can also expel a card from the collection.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Pinterest
project3.description: This project is an exploration into FireBase. I used cards to display information pulled from Firebase, you can edit, create, or delete the cards. The information also shows up differently depending on what user is logged in.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Version Control with Github, Firebase

project4.title: Mushroom Picker
project4.description: This project is an exploration into React. You click the pick a shroom button to make a random mushroom and different effects happen depending on which mushroom you get. The goal is to collect all the mushrooms.
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Version Control with Github, React, Sass
